kannada_original: ಇದೆ ಮಣ್ಣು, ಇದೆ ನೀರು ; ಮೊಳೆತರದು ನಿಜ ಫಸಲು !
english_transliteration: Ide maṇṇu, ide nīru; moḷetaradu nija phasalu!
english_translation: Here is the soil, here is the water; the true harvest does not sprout by itself!
In the garden of blossoming, you are merely the gardener.

kannada_original: ಇದೆ ಎಣ್ಣೆ, ಇದೆ ಬತ್ತಿ ; ಕೂಡಿದರೆ ಅದು ಬೆಳಕು !
english_transliteration: Ide eṇṇe, ide batti; kūḍidare adu beḷaku!
english_translation: Here is the oil, here is the wick; when they combine, it is light!
That light is astonishment (or: wonder) – Muddu Rāma.
